DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Christmas Stamp Kit - Santa, Candy Cane, Rudolf (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Christmas Stamp Kits are a perfect way to make this Christmas season more enjoyable. The Kit includes 3 face paint stamps (candy cane, santa and rudolph) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (bright red, white and beige brown).
Snazaroo's specially designed EVA stamps are perfect for use on children. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and one inch thick. Easy to use even for beginner users.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This Stamp Kit will paint about 750 cheek art designs.
Includes 3 face paint stamps (candy cane, santa and rudolph) and 3 of Snazaroo's 2 ml face paints (bright red, white and beige brown).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
